website_summaries.verdict: An attractive price, but you may be sacrificing a bit on the quality of material.
pros: Spacious for a bargain-end cat or small dog house
Not heated, but will accommodate a heating pad or blanket
cons: We weren't impressed with the initial sturdiness, but reinforcements are possible
The roof has a tendency to detach from the living space

customer_reviews.title: What a find!
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the money! It was the perfect size for my Cavalier King Charles Spaniel and she loves it! She's a 20 lb dog and stands about 12 inches high, but could easily go in and out the door. The whole thing is collapsible and assembles with velcro, with a removable pad inside so I think the whole thing will be easily cleaned! You just open the main house as pictured to assemble it, attach the roof with velcro and put the pad inside, simple assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it and so do we!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering another cube-shaped bed that ended up being too small for our 13 lb cat, I decided to spend the few extra dollars to get this adorable house-bed. I was hesitant based on a couple of negative reviews, but I'm glad I went ahead and made the purchase through Amazon Prime! Our cat immediately abandoned her other older bed and took right to her new house! It really is adorable and I live that I can take out the pillow if I ever want to wash it. The top of the house velcroes on to the "frame" which is also convenient. The house stands straight and doesn't sag at all! Overall I'm very impressed and highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pet house I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today. I must say this pet house is better than expected. It measures L 21 x W 13.5 x H 17. I thought it looks small initially. My cats proved me wrong. The moment I turned around to clean up, they all rush inside, fighting each other for the pet house. And yes, it can fit 2 cats if they don't fight. My cats are 3 yrs old, between 10~15 LB. They are not small. I attached 2 pictures taken at start of the fight, and the victor.
customer_reviews.author: Elidan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My two cats are enjoying their new house! This is the only bed that they use!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Castiglione

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my outside cat can stay warm in the garage in the winter. She uses it all the time to the point where it's completely covered in her fur. It's compressable, so it's easy to store and transport. She weighs about 8 pounds and you could probably fit four of her in it, so it would be good for basically any size cat and for many breeds of small dog.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Auxier

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my Pomeranian
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. The roof has a particular way of being placed and is held by Velcro. It is perfect for my Pomeranian. In the picture, she is under the removable bed so you can see the thickness. It took a long time to ship but I wasn't in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P

customer_reviews.title: Zoe's palace
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Zoe just loves her little house bed!!!! It's so adorable! ♡
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My friend received this and she loves it! She says, it's bigger than she thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Prism

customer_reviews.title: Very nice house!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Yorkies (brother & sister) love their houses. I bought 1 house for them to share. However, the sister did not want to share with her brother so a few days later I realized I had to buy another house for him. They are cuddled in their houses all of the time. I love that they fold up nicely for traveling too. I would have rated the house a 10 if the rating went that high.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. This product is more brown in colour than it is black but it's still a great buy. I only had one issue and it was that I wanted it to be a bit bigger. Fits an 8 week old shi Tzu terrier just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to keep the cat off the couch..... Even though he has two beds.... Sam is a senior who is particular about his comfort. Finally!!! Who knew....three days later he's as snug as a bug The roof zips on. It says black we received brown. If Sam is happy the whole house is happy..
customer_reviews.author: Januaryice

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so fast so that was exciting because I wanted to put the little house to good use and my dog loved it! It’s like his little mansion. It’s so big!! And it was easy to put up. It did have a smell upon opening it but that’s long gone. Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Atrocious Craftsmanship or lack there of
customer_reviews.text: This product advertises that a cat can fit into it. It is the largest size available and even a fart couldn’t fit in it. My 10lb cat hated it and couldn’t fit. It looks like a kindergarten art project too; it’s made with felt not actual fabric. The only upside is the seller refunded me immediately upon UPS picking up my return of it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jenna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT and so does may cat
customer_reviews.text: I've some of the negative reviews and I'm wondering what happened to their bed. I personally love it, it's easy to assemble, it stands up straight and my cat loves it. It's not a house made of wood, it's a pet bed/house made of cloth. it's sturdy enough for the cat to sleep in it and that's what it's made for.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: So cute, easy to assemble, the cat LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: This house is ADORABLE!!!! I was looking for somewhere for my kitty to hide during storms so she'd stop getting under the couch where she can hurt herself. The first day I got this she hung out in there all day. I just gave her some treats, then threw them inside so she's associate the house with a pleasant experience, and bam. Instant love. This house is so easy to put together too. Took me less than 5 minutes, and is just the cutest thing I've ever seen. It is definitely large enough to fit two medium size cats if you have two buddy-buddy cats that would share a house. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Evin

customer_reviews.title: My dogs collapse the roof and remove the pad...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. My dachshunds spend very little time in it however and tend to either drag the pad out or just jump on top to collapse it and use it as a bed. It's cute and everything but our dogs just refuse to use it for the intended purpose! Maybe if I reinforced it so it wouldn't collapse and secured the pad inside it would get more use but we've just decided to let them use it however they want.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: The doghouse/bed is cute but it is very lightweight so my dog gets in and it moves around as she moves in it. The cushion is not good, it is stuffed very lightly so it is next to useless. It is cute but really, my dog just drags it around. If it were sturdy, like a heavy floor and a good solid cushion, it would be great but it isn't. I have a bichon frise puppy so she isn't very big or weight much.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Cute but falls over easy
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very cute but it falls over easy. We had to attach a board to the bottom of it to keep it upright. Other than that our furbabies love it. They should change the foam in the walls. Our dog has been tearing it out and could choke on it
customer_reviews.author: myopinion

customer_reviews.title: I absoluetely love it - but it is not black
customer_reviews.text: My cat checked it out, and hasn't been inside it since. It is, however, very well made and constructed. I absoluetely love it - but it is not black. It is a very weird shade of brown. Nonetheless, it has held its shape (even with being shipped in a small box), it goes together easily and can be washed with ease, and its just cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Mhm! Price fluctuation!
customer_reviews.text: I came back to buy this since it was not that easy to clean it up after a couple of months, but now it’s higher price. This item used to be $22 and that is why I came back. Seller needs to fix this pricing for return customers!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: They both love this house
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted! I have a Chihuahua and a maltipoo. They both love this house. My Chihuahua used to get kicked out of his bed all the time by my maltipoo.. now he can go in the house and block the door and she can't do anything about it! The top zippers on and I throw all their toys in it so that they aren't thrown across the floor. Overall a great purchase. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect house for cat or small dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought. It’s been a couple years and the old one still is ok but I m putting out back for the strays. It had been washed dozens of times and retained its shape and colors. Great cat house.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Bystry

customer_reviews.title: WINNER
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best gift I have ever bought my dog.. easy to put together. You have never seen anything so cute in your life as when I tell my Pipkin "go to your home" and she prances right to her new house. I can hardly get her out sometimes. hide all her little treats inside and toys.If I had one thing to complain about it would be the bed inside could be alittle thicker, by no means is it to thin. worst case we always re-stuff it thicker in the future if it ever thins out.Thank you for a outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Rikitikitavi

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Adorable doghouse easy to put together ...top zips on and off..thin pillow comes with it I put a reg size pillow in mine... was big enough for my min pin who was 12 lbs but she only went in few times I think my cats like it better they both get in it and they r large cats...
customer_reviews.author: sharon roy

customer_reviews.title: Very  cute house
customer_reviews.text: This little house is so cute my little Chihuahua loves it soon as I got it up he went right in it it came out of the package real nice it wasn't bald up or messed up very easy to put together it took 5 seconds we are very pleased thank you worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Ruff not as in bark but “RUFF” as in (bad) product
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment to say the least. House comes in two sections a top and bottom, which you need to zip together. Zipper is so cheap and house poorly designed that the zipper does not close right at several spots of the house. I was thinking to myself as I tried to put it together was.....WHO SIGHNED OFF ON THIS. Ummm ya EXCHANGE
customer_reviews.author: molitor

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Assembles in 1 minute and very durable. My dog is 12 lbs and I wouldn't recommend for any animal larger than that. The price is great and I'm really glad we got it. Adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kinikia

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! However my pup still hasnt figured out how to go inside we will keep working on it. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Phalesha

customer_reviews.title: Color not as described, but nice house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I have a larger cat and he fits inside with no issues. He went in minutes after I set it up and loves it. The only thing that I was disappointed about is that the description said it was black, which was one of my deciding factors in getting this particular house. The top part is black and white, but the house was brown. Not real excited about that, but my cat likes the house so there was no sense in returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cat bed, ordered one and my cats fought over who got to be in it, so I ordered 3 more! Large enough even a big kitty has space to turn around.
customer_reviews.author: KittyLvr

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 1 year old cat that we adopted from a shelter. Unfortunately he doesn't like it because of however he was treated in the past. We figured it would be a good fit as he like to go under the beds a lot, so something dark and enclosed we thought would be ideal for him. Wrong. He doesn't ever go in it. This is not a bad review of the item itself, as the bed is perfect. Our cat just doesn't like it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received this cat house today and was so pleased to see the quality for the cost. The size is significant and large enough for my 15lb. tabby. This house will keep him warm and cozy during the cold winter months. The roof zips on all the way around! Don't hesitate to buy this for your kitty!
customer_reviews.author: mom2883

customer_reviews.title: My lil' kitty prince loves his new castle!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES his castle! My cat is 12 lbs. of cuteness and he fits comfortably in this little space. I sprinkled a little cat nip in there to really entice him, and it worked! I took the roof off it it because, I think he likes jumping in and out of it. He uses the little door too though. Great and cute for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this. Its small
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. Its small. its perfect for my 6 lb chihuahua but my 21 lb'r is a little squashed but he still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McMickle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how such a good quality item can cost so little and ship from China, but I'm glad it does! My two kitties got in it the second I put it down, and they take cap naps in it all the time. With how close they snuggle, another cat could fit in it no problem. With its size, a large cat like a Maine Coon or Ragdoll could fit in it very comfortably. It's simple to construct. In comes in three pieces. The roof and pillow you have to attach, which is extremely simple. You just set the pillow inside, and the roof velcros to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Bastet

customer_reviews.title: Best Made Doggy Bed
customer_reviews.text: My babies love this bed, they actually run to see who gets it first. One is actually too big for it but he squeezes himself into anyway. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Truckn Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great Little House
customer_reviews.text: This little house gives my small dogs a place to "be alone", to take a nap and to eat their treats in private. Its great, color is good, the only thing I would recommend is to put a little more filling in the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG LOVES IT. IT IS VERY CUTE. ...
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG LOVES IT. IT IS VERY CUTE. HE IS COMFY IN IT . HE IS 9 POUNDS. ANY LARGER DOG AND IT WOULD BE TOO SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my Dachshund
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. It was way too small for my 13 pound Dachshund. It would be okay for a small cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item is exactly as described and pictured. It's a ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described and pictured. It's a little too small for my 26 lb pug (she's a big girl) but my 10 lb chihuahua loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Janine

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AWESOME - SO GLAD I ORDERED
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome pet house. It can easily house two 15 pound cats. I have a 10 year old mini-kitty who weighs under 4 lbs who LOVES sleeping in here to hide from her large brothers. Very well made and sturdy. Takes 15 seconds to set up. So glad I ordered this and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shelley rosa

customer_reviews.title: It's "ehhh"
customer_reviews.text: This product took a while to come in. When it finally did, I was very disappointed. Neither of my dogs even fit into it. It's definitely not "high-end". It looks bigger than what it is, and not as nice in person as pictured. If you have a small dog like a Yorkie then this purchase wouldn't be a complete waste. It's not a bad purchase, just not as nice as I expected it to be and too small for my Westie dogs. I'm not one to leave reviews usually but I wanted to hopefully save someone that has a small/medium dog from buying this!! ONLY REALLY SMALL DOGS!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Doggie House!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it In black, but received brown. It's adorable though! You can move it from place to pace with ease , , and it even comes with a pillow to place in the bottom. I also put a blanket down for my dog. She loves it! ❤️🐶
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than the picture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed on June 14th. It arrived on July 3rd. Pretty quick in my opinion considering it came via China post. The bed is seriously the cutest thing ever. The picture doesn't do it justice. My dog loves it. She wont come out of it. I have a Shi Tzu mixed. She fits perfectly in it. The only downside to the bed is the cushion that comes with it is pretty cheaply made. Not a deal breaker or even a problem. She buries herself underneath it. Love this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Big enough for our 20lb cat. Good quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great product for such a low price !
customer_reviews.text: Simply adorable . Made well ... easy to assemble . My cats ... each 15 lbs ( just big cats) love love love it . They’re actually fighting over it . Going to order another one .
customer_reviews.author: Kat Zinger

customer_reviews.title: Cutest house ever
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a Tricky Tray filled with dog and cat things. Everybody loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McNally

customer_reviews.title: Quality is poor returning is a headache.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the cheapest piece of crap ever! Don't waste your money. I ordered black and got brownish black the quality was horrible. Complete waste of money. To try to return it was a complete headache. It looks cute and plush but isn't! We threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Orlando dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! This pet house is not worth a cent.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made pet house. The roof velcros on and its not the easy by any means. My shih-tzu was inside this pet house for no more than ten minutes and thin layer of poorly made fabric that covers the foam inside the pet house was ripped out in dozens of pieces. I took the pet house away from my shih-tzu and gave him a pillow instead. I was tired of picking up foam off of my floor every day.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE HOUSE...SOOO WORTH THE MONEY LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pet house!!! My cats LOVE it!! As soon as I zippered the top on my Siamese went right in and laid down. He acts like he owns it right now. Very well made house and SOO worth the money. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!! Hopefully my Siamese lets my Chihuahua and other kitty go in too : )
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is a horrible idea
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but the zipper is very weak and was already off track when I first assembled it. Now that my dog has played in it, the zipper is useless. The zipper zips all the way around the roof of the house holding it together. So now he has a roofless house but he still lays in it and enjoys resting there
customer_reviews.author: Ms Dia

customer_reviews.title: and is easy to clean with the top coming off
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and they share this house. I find them in there just about everyday. It is cute, keeps them warm, and is easy to clean with the top coming off. It works much better for me than the two separate houses I had before because they both tired to cram in there when there was only room for one. This is just perfect for them. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Delawaredeb

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I finally got the dog house and less than 5 minutes the stuffing/foam was in shreds. I have a chihuahua and her nails aren't sharp I dremal them and the material inside is soooooo this it rips. I'm so glad I was near by in case she eat it. Sending back tomorrow to the company this is not a good product for dogs. Cute idea but not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Dog liked it pretty well and was super easy to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog liked it pretty well and was super easy to get up but it got tore up pretty easy wouldn't recommend it for super rough or chewing dogs but other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bed but wayyy smaller then then described. My 12 lb poodle could never fit into it!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine R

customer_reviews.title: Kitty shark
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little small but super cute, my 20lb cat is apparently too fat.
customer_reviews.author: vortatia

customer_reviews.title: Happy cats happy mom :)
customer_reviews.text: My cats instantly fell in love with this house. They love sleeping in it and I love seeing them in this cozy house. Definitely worth the $20 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: quratolain a.

customer_reviews.title: portable house
customer_reviews.text: Hay, this was a fantastic buy. It is easy, portable, light and easy to put together. I loved it and so did my little dog. He always went into it when he wanted some time to himself and wanted to not be bothered. I well be buying another when I have another dog.
customer_reviews.author: Miss josette

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super super cute. Very very happy with my purchase. Cushion inside is soft and not too thin. Dog not interested in it yet but we are working on it.
customer_reviews.author: briana

customer_reviews.title: Washable!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute House!! Easy Clean!! Wash!! And Put In The Dryer!! Good as New!!
customer_reviews.author: Laughoutloud!!!!😂

customer_reviews.title: This little house is so durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of the house and my cat loves it. I also like that I can wash the entire house including the padding inside. I can take a house with me when we go on trips. I know she loves the comfort of her house because she is always inside checking everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Treadwell

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice, but our cat didn't use it much
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice, but our cat didn't use it much. Not sure why. We gave it to my wife's sister, and her cats like it and use it plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: This is much larger and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 10 lbs. Yorkie to replace her old "house". This is much larger and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little dog/cat house it great for small pets
customer_reviews.text: This little dog/cat house it great for small pets. Its fun to watch them go in and out, and enjoy themselves in it. A must for any small pet owner! BTW it is made well should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: We are moving and furniture is changing. This was one of our additions. Fortunately, the cats love it. So much so that we are getting another one. Two will work better than one. Came all Scrunched up but breaks apart easily. The top comes off and is velcroed on. The mat on the inside comes out and is very easy to vacuum. Very light and surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gilpin

customer_reviews.title: Both my cats love this little house
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats love this little house. One cat likes sleeping on something soft, while my other cat prefers something firmer, like the carpet.... So, I took the cushion out and put it in the windowsill for one cat, and put a rug under the house for the other. Now both cats have a comfy place to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Nelson

customer_reviews.title: cat house
customer_reviews.text: my cats love it and it can also be washed, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: cjmf3

customer_reviews.title: Cuter in person! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the cutest pet house ever. Perfect size for my mini dachshund to hideaway in. No assembly, lightweight, fits in a corner. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Asbury

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to house both my cats, small enough to fit anywhere easily. My cats (full grown and one a bit overweight) love this house, and occasionally fight over it. I love it too, and am enjoying watching them sit in their little house as if they owned it. (Which, they kinda do!)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Velcro attachment for the roof from the last one I bought, this one had a zipper. My dogs love it! I will keep buying this one as long as they use them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Pictures make it seem bigger than it is. It collapses too easily. But the cats seem to like it decently.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Diamont

customer_reviews.title: Best for smaller cats.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but My cats smashed it & sleep on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Patty R

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This house is absolutely adorable. My little Chihuahua loves it!!! Love the idea that they roof comes off and it is collapsible to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to receive but worth the wait. My fur baby loves her new condo.
customer_reviews.author: EllenW

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice. Portable and zip on roof. My pup loves it. Provides a nice private area for them. Only rating 4 stars because I ordered black and it is brown. Not a bad shade of brown though.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves her new house
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves her new house. I didn't notice any smell like some of the other reviewers commented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Bed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this came in 2 pieces and that the sides are soft. We never really got it to work right or the top to go on properly. It's ok. The cats like it but the quality of the sides and difficulty of getting the top to attach properly has me quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: FairZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: The roof is hard to keep on but I adore it and so does my sister's chihuahuas. Thank you for making it affordable! I was desperate for a dog bed like this and couldn't find a single one affordable, I'm a very happy and lucky girl!
customer_reviews.author: ashleybrewer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to arrive, but the house is great! SUPER cute and very funny. Also easy to wash, assemble and clean. Great bed! Have gotten lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: vbodden

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Our Coffee Bean loves her new house! A very spoiled Bean is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana Ramrekha

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The pillow has very poorly stuffed but just put a blanket inside and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even manage to finish zipping the roof on before he hoped in! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lowe

customer_reviews.title: My grandson like it too
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this house and he looks cute in it. My grandson like it too. He just barely squeezes inside. He is two and a half
customer_reviews.author: Alice Weisbrod

customer_reviews.title: Delightful cat house
customer_reviews.text: I have six cats and they love this house, someone is always hanging off of it. It is washable, which I like. It is a good price. It has room for at least three full gown cats.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & cute! My 2 Chihuahuas fit comfortably in this lil house. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua adores it and its so easy to take apart and put back together. Its light and I can take it with me as she doesn't like regular dog beds and prefers to be covered in someway. She fills regular dog beds over and goes inside them for more security. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moses.

customer_reviews.title: I think they are really going to enjoy it and it looks like it will last a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I thought, it will hold my two cats in it and have space to spare. It's soft and comfy looking, I think they are really going to enjoy it and it looks like it will last a long while. I am glad I got this especially since anything even remotely as big and warm is way more expensive than this nice pet house.
customer_reviews.author: ToriGirl

customer_reviews.title: I like it more than the cats
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little house! I like it more than the cats. lol They will sit in it occasionally, but it mostly just sits there looking cute. Well worth the price. It comes from China, but it didn't take as long as it said it would to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Frady

customer_reviews.title: JUST TO SMALL😟
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this very soft well made great space saver vs a big cage I have a Rabbit who isn't so small when he stretches out he's very long just wasen't big enough u
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M Roll

customer_reviews.title: Cute favorite at our house
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the dog but the cat won't let him have it!
customer_reviews.author: Gleny M

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the cats. They use them all the time and seem to love them just as much as a new box.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Felder

customer_reviews.title: Maine coon kitty approved!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a covered cat bed that a Maine coon can fit into, this is great ! My smokey loves his.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: thus neither can enjoy it in peace
customer_reviews.text: My cat and my dog can't agree on who this pet house belongs to, thus neither can enjoy it in peace.
customer_reviews.author: VMDoland

customer_reviews.title: but it looks like the picture and my little dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Was a little difficult to get the roof on, but it looks like the picture and my little dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tuns

customer_reviews.title: Plush and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Cute kitty house is plush and soft. Bendable and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tiaany

customer_reviews.title: So well made and cute but my cat wouldn't go ...
customer_reviews.text: So well made and cute but my cat wouldn't go in maybe in time.....she did finally went in for a nap!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Underwood

customer_reviews.title: She had one shaped like a car when she was little
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Yorkies and my oldest one loves these soft dog houses. She had one shaped like a car when she was little. She is 13 yrs old now and still loves tooling around inside this little house. It's cute... I dint even mind it sitting in my living room. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have big chihuahuas fit prefect. This house is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: dena p.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute but too small for my Schnauzer's. They can't even fit through the door.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Maier

customer_reviews.title: And surprise it is Great! Both dogs and cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Took so many months I gave up on it. When it arrived I had no idea what it was. And surprise it is Great! Both dogs and cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: SKL Cat Dog Bed House Portable Indoor Pet House Dog Bed Cave Bed
product_meta.description:
Pattern Name:Cow spotted dog bedIdeal for small and medium pets
The shape of the house is suitable for pets up to 5 kg, which is very 
suitable for family pets, such as Teddy, Poodle, Schnauzer, Bichon, Papillon and so on.

Special design for outdoor or indoor use
These pet houses for puppies and cats are
feature_bullets: PLUSH PET TENT: We’ve designed these tent houses for dogs and cats using faux suede, linen or corduroy and each comes with soft poly-foam lining.

COZY DOG HOUSE: The dimension of this indoor tent gives your pet a touch of privacy and creates a nice sense of security. 20 x 15 x 14 inches,suitable for dogs under 5kgs such as Teddy , Poodle ,Schnauzer Pekingese,Bichon Frise ,Papillon and so on.
STRONG AND STURDY: We carefully make our soft dog house for dogs and cats to give them maximum durability. Roofs and walls of dog houses use magic tape links to make the house more sturdy.
GREAT INDOOR STYLE: Lovable pet house design pet bed with bed mat,Enclosed design is perfect for pets who like to burrow.
EASY TO MAINTAIN: The top is detachable and foldable for easy storage and maintenance.
